description: [GrimAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0632) uses the last 64 bytes of the binary to compute a mutex name. If the generated name is invalid, it will default to the generic `mymutex`.(Citation: Group IB GrimAgent July 2021)

external_references.description: Priego, A. (2021, July). THE BROTHERS GRIM: THE REVERSING TALE OF GRIMAGENT MALWARE USED BY RYUK. Retrieved September 19, 2024.
